about_the_game:
What is the iVRy GearVR System Files Installer DLC?

• It is the installer for the Samsung GearVR System Files for supported Samsung Galaxy/Note mobile phones.

As of June 2024, Samsung and Meta (Oculus) no longer provide working updates for the Samsung Gear VR software. In addition to devices that are factory reset and need to install the software, there is also an issue with the Gear VR software updater that can prevent devices that already have the Gear VR software installed from working.

This installer installs the latest versions of the Samsung Gear VR and Oculus/Meta software to Samsung Galaxy/Note mobile phones.

NOTE: It is not possible to install the GearVR software to other manufacturers' devices, or to unsupported Samsung mobile phones.
